help.description: Displays a complete list of commands.

about.description: Displays full information about the bot.

ban.description: This command bans the user on the server. He will not be able to join the server by invitation until he is unbanned.

kick.description: This command kicks the user out of the server. But unlike a ban, a user can connect back to the server using the invitation link.

unban.description: This command will unlock the user on the server

multiban.description: This command bans several users in a row. ** Please note that this command has not been tested and may not work correctly. **

purge.description: This command deletes a certain number of messages in the current channel.

mute.description: This command muddies a person, that is, he will not be able to send messages on any channel until he is muddied.

unmute.description: This command pisses off the user, that is, he can send messages again.

setname.description: This command sets a nickname for the user.

user.description: This command shows some information about the user that cannot be viewed in standard ways. For example, when it was registered, etc.

channel.description: This command displays information about the channel

server.description: This command displays information about the server.

emoji.description: This command displays the ID of a third-party emoticon and displays a full emoji picture, so that it can be downloaded.

avatar.description: This command displays an avatar of a user or a bot, as well as a link to download it.

prefix.description: This command sets a unique prefix on the server.

locale.description: This command sets the bot language on the server. Available: **en_EN**, **ru_RU**.

ping.description: This command shows the latency of the host.
